text: Will Hayes (born 5 June 1995) is an Australian rules footballer who plays for the Western Bulldogs in the Australian Football League (AFL). He was selected at pick #78 in the 2018 national draft. He made his senior debut against Carlton in round 5 of the 2019 season. He graduated from Melbourne Grammar School in 2013 alongside best mate and fellow footballer Zach Merretthttps://www.foxsports.com.au/afl/3am-alarms-and-life-at-sha-tin-new- western-bulldogs-recruit-will-hayes-has-travelled-far-and-wide-for-this- chance/news-story/a3ff28cfb668bc69fa7dfca4381ec3ce. He is the son of racehorse trainer David Hayes. Hayes is currently studying a Bachelor of Commerce at Deakin University. ==References== ==External links== * *Will Hayes from AFL Tables Category:Western Bulldogs players Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:Australian rules footballers from Victoria (Australia)
title: Will Hayes (footballer)
